Bases: sqlalchemy.ext.declarative.api.Model

Defines a MealPlan as represented in the database. Along with some utility functions.

Returns a JSON representation of this Meal Plan

meal_plan¶
static next_weekday(weekday)[source]¶

Gets the next weekday after date :param date: DateTime to start :param weekday: 0 for Monday … 6 for Sunday :return: DateTime with date as the next weekday and time identical to provided date.

update_meal_count()[source]¶

Uses a meal credit, as outlined by the plan. :return: Boolean, whether a credit was available
